definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidized bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了氣相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反應器的兩相模型。

sentences.english: The process of polyvinyl butyral (PVB)was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了聚乙烯醇縮丁醛生產的工藝流程。

sentences.english: PE Packer is used for paper box, paper case, color printing corporation, etc.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙烯自動打包機用於紙盒，紙箱彩色印刷公司。

sentences.english: It shows that the low-density polythene has better improved effects.
sentences.chinese: 低密度聚乙烯具有較好的改性效果。

sentences.english: Conductor screen is formed by extruded semi-conducting layer or wrapped with semi-conducting tapes and semi-conducting layer.
sentences.chinese: 絕緣採用超淨交聯聚乙烯絕緣料擠包在導體屏蔽上。

sentences.english: Best result are obtained by shutting down on a non-TPU resin like polyethylene.
sentences.chinese: 最好的結果是停止使用非聚氨酯樹脂，如聚乙烯。

sentences.english: The grafting of acrylic acid onto a polyethylene film by the pre-irradiation method was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 採用預輻射法研究了丙烯酸對聚乙烯膜的接枝反應。

sentences.english: The one-stage process silane crosslinked PE anti-precrossing linking technology was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一步法硅烷交聯聚乙烯抗預交聯技術。

sentences.english: In this paper, waste wood flour was used to reinforce high-density polyethylene ( HDPE).
sentences.chinese: 本研究採用廢木粉爲填料增強改性高密度聚乙烯。

sentences.english: Foaming formula of PE/waste-paper composite is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對聚乙烯和廢紙複合材料發泡配方進行了研究。

sentences.english: Copper conductor XLPE insulated low-smoke and non-halo sheathed Flame-retardant power cable.
sentences.chinese: 銅芯交聯聚乙烯絕緣低煙無滷護套阻燃電力電纜。

sentences.english: We are the factory of the LLDPE stretch film at China mainland.
sentences.chinese: 我們是工廠的線型低密度聚乙烯拉伸膜在中國大陸。

sentences.english: The effect of polyvinyl acetals on its adhesive strength was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探討了聚乙烯醇縮醛的粘接強度的影響。

sentences.english: Finally the polyethylene oil pot is produced by blow molding. The product has good appearance and quality.
sentences.chinese: 採用聚乙烯吹塑生產出油壺，產品外觀和質量較好。

sentences.english: Water-based magnetic fluids dispersed by polyvinyl alcohol(PVA) were prepared by chemical coprecipitation.
sentences.chinese: 採用化學共沉澱法製備了聚乙烯醇分散水基磁流體。

sentences.english: A novel two-phase model for the fluidize bed of polyethylene with condensed mode operation was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了氣相法聚乙烯冷凝模式操作反應器的兩相模型。
